---
title: "ShowLabels"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/website.rs -->

Whether the entity's [`components.Text`](https://rerun.io/docs/reference/types/components/text) label is shown.

The main purpose of this component existing separately from the labels themselves
is to be overridden when desired, to allow hiding and showing from the viewer and
blueprints.

## Rerun datatype
[`Bool`](../datatypes/bool.md)


## Arrow datatype
```
boolean
```
